entries.title: Newcastle United 'praying for' former star missing after Turkey earthquake
entries.description: Newcastle United say they are "praying for some positive news" amid reports that their former player Christian Atsu is among those trapped under rubble following this morning's earthquake in Turkey.

entries.title: Ski guide and snow plough driver among at least eight killed in Alps avalanches
entries.description: At least eight people including a snow plough driver and a ski guide were killed in avalanches in the Alps over the weekend.

entries.title: Strong, shallow and beneath a highly-populated area - this is the worst kind of earthquake
entries.description: With a magnitude of 7.8, the initial earthquake to hit southeastern Turkey was one of the most powerful the country has ever experienced.

entries.title: Terrifying video shows block of flats collapse in less than ten seconds
entries.description: A huge rumbling crash, screeches of buckling metal and shouts from people running away can be heard in dramatic footage of a seven-storey building collapsing in Turkey.

entries.title: Why is the earthquake death toll so high in Turkey and Syria?
entries.description: As the death toll continues to rise following the 7.8-magnitude earthquake that struck Turkey and Syria, huge numbers of rescuers continue to comb through rubble in search of people left alive.

entries.title: 'Spy balloon' spotted over Latin America is for 'civilian usage', China says
entries.description: A suspected surveillance balloon spotted over Latin America is for "civilian usage" and entered the region's airspace by accident, a Chinese foreign ministry spokeswoman has said.

entries.title: Strong earthquake hits Turkey, killing at least five - and felt elsewhere in the Middle East
entries.description: A 7.8-magnitude earthquake has shaken southern Turkey, killing at least five people according to authorities.
